name: Broken Memory
description:
You are an explorer named Blue and you soon realise that you are in an unfamiliar environment with no recollection of how you got there. You search for your friends and hopefully a golden block, but on this arduous journey, it is hard to tell the difference between friend and frenemy.

Controls

  • Arrow keys - Move
  • Space - Finish reading text
  • Z - Pick up and throw block 
  • R - Restart
  • P - Play from the beginning

Goal

Find a golden block (Unfortunately, I ran out of time and there isn't one yet, sorry)

Main features (so far)

  • The ability to pick up and throw a block
  • Enemy AI
